body:
All of everything I wrote in that link is true.

After banning users, CaptainMeta4 now blocks their guilds from being sieged for an undisclosed on ruqqus amount of time, but tells everyone in his discord when they will be available to siege.
body_html:
All of everything I wrote in that link is true.

After banning users, CaptainMeta4 now blocks their guilds from being sieged for an undisclosed on ruqqus amount of time, but tells everyone in his discord when they will be available to siege.
meta_description:
Recently a certain high profile user was perma banned so all his guilds should have been made available to siege.

Except @CaptainMeta4 decided to lock those guilds for potential sieging for an undisclosed amount of time, so regular ruqqus users had no idea their sieges would fail and end up being blocked from sieging for 30 more days.

CaptainMeta4 exclusively told everyone in his Ruqqus discord only when those guilds would become available for siege, one of them slipped up and revealed this to me when I was mad that my siege still failed.
meta_title: The ruqqus cabal is real and here is more proof of their fuckery - Ruqqus
title: I have evidence of the cabal secretly plotting to powermod guilds

body: @CrystalVulpine I've lost the name of the bigger guild where we were previously discussing stuff like this, can you remember which one it was?
body_html: @CrystalVulpine I've lost the name of the bigger guild where we were previously discussing stuff like this, can you remember which one it was?

guild.description:
Here we go again...

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/post/66iv/ee_ubwXLfNg)

*Cabal*: n. the contrived schemes of a group of persons secretly united in a plot - also: a group engaged in such schemes.

*Powermod*: n. [short for power moderator] a person of power, usually a moderator on a structured website, that takes too many unpopulist stances

This guild is dedicated to whistleblowing and preventing powermods and the forming of a powermod oligarchy which would censor opinions and lead Ruqqus into the same corruption that is killing Reddit.
